GSD.description:
debugfs: add debugfs_lookup_and_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.213 by commit 9fc8c5fa423052e9b5c19939edbad7faf547bc59. For more details please see the references link.
